caller_intent: Bunny wants to add her boyfriend, Bishop Anderson, to her car insurance policy and clarify why she only received a partial refund ($20) after paying $315 for her policy renewal, when her new balance was $230 (a $60 discrepancy).
resolution_steps: Jamie confirms Bunny's identity and policy details (National General, 1520 Runabout Road, Littlefield, NC).
Jamie adds Bishop Anderson to the policy using provided details (DOB: 6/20/2002, NC license).
Jamie explains the $81 annual premium increase for adding Bishop.
Jamie addresses the refund discrepancy by explaining system recalculations after removing a vehicle, which increased the single-vehicle premium.
Jamie clarifies that the $19 refund was processed after the new year of driving experience was applied, but the $60 difference may stem from delayed system updates.
knowledge_required: Insurance pricing mechanics (multi-car discounts, risk assessment for single vs. multiple vehicles).
Policy renewal processes and billing system delays.
Address change impacts on insurance rates.
summary: Bunny added her boyfriend to her car insurance policy and discussed a billing discrepancy. Jamie explained that removing a vehicle increased her single-vehicle premium and clarified the refund was processed after system updates, though a $60 gap remained unexplained. The call concluded with Bunny understanding the premium changes and refund timeline.
